pageContext.claim: “Now Fake News @CNN is actually reporting that I wanted my daughter, Ivanka, to run with me as my Vice President in 2016 Election. Wrong and totally ridiculous. These people are sick!”
pageContext.analysis: CNN was not alone in reporting that Trump considered his eldest daughter for Vice President. The claims originates in a book by his former deputy campaign manager Rick Gates. A senior campaign aide in 2016 Gates was well positioned to be involved in the conversations about who should be Trump’s running mate.
